about.title: About Me
about.description1: With over 8 years of experience in software engineering, I specialize in building robust, scalable applications and leading engineering teams. As CTO and co-founder of Platsage, I've designed AI-powered omnichannel messaging platforms that serve 50+ businesses and handle 100k+ monthly conversations.
about.description2: My expertise spans full-stack development, cloud architecture, AI implementation, and team leadership. I'm passionate about creating solutions that not only meet business requirements but also drive measurable impact, like reducing customer response time by 70% through AI automation.

platsage.title: CTO & Co-Founder
platsage.description:
Founded and scaled an AI-powered omnichannel messaging platform integrating WhatsApp, social media, and web chat for SMEs. 
 Led a team of 6 engineers, driving hiring, mentoring, and culture as the company scaled operations. 
 Designed the system architecture on AWS + Pulumi, achieving 99.9% uptime while handling 100k+ monthly conversations. 
 Implemented AI-assisted chat automation that reduced average customer response time by 70%, improving conversion rates. 
 Grew platform adoption to 50+ businesses, increasing client online sales and generating recurring SaaS revenue.

oneragtime.title: Full Stack Developer
oneragtime.description:
Delivered complete features using test-driven development, participating from architecture design to polished UX. 
 Built scalable services with Django, Vue.js, Docker, and MySQL. 
 Reduced bugs in production by ~20% by introducing automated testing and CI/CD pipelines (initiative side project tracked via Sentry).

capvital.title: Full Stack Developer
capvital.description:
Owned development in critical banking transaction systems, where feature changes previously took weeks due to reliability concerns. 
 Designed a parallel validation service that cloned the database, executed old and new transaction processes in parallel, and flagged discrepancies.
  This innovation provided high reliability and confidence in production changes, reducing development cycles from weeks to days.
